title: As Seguidoras
overview: When Liv, a vegan social media influencer, goes live in celebration of her 100k followers, she is ambushed by a past enemy who threatens her with something worse than death: cancellation. Afraid of losing all of her followers, she ends up impulsively taking the man's life, becoming entangled in a series of murders that consolidate her modus operandi as a serial killer. However, she doesn't know she's being followed by a podcaster who might ruin everything.
